title: The artwork shows the man with the nose around the neck to represent multiculturalism.
subtitle: A piece of art depicting a man selling a tree so that he can hang himself from it is supposed to have won a contest to film the state of multiculturalism in Europe.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A piece of art depicting a man selling a tree in an attempt to hang himself won a contest to film the current era of multiculturalism in Europe.
